text: Leventina is a district of the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. The capital city of the district is Faido. == Circles and municipalities == Circolo di Airolo Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area km² Airolo 2032 94.5 Bedretto 71 75.2 Total 2103 169.7 Circolo di Giornico Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area km² Anzonico 104 10.6 Bodio 1083 6.4 Cavagnago 93 6.7 Giornico 940 19.5 Personico 354 39.1 Pollegio 1051 5.9 Sobrio 77 6.4 Total 3702 94.6 Circolo di Faido Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area km² Calpiogna 35 3.3 Campello 59 4.0 Chironico 402 57.7 Faido 2026 25.5 Mairengo 451 6.6 Osco 116 11.9 Total 3089 109.0 Circolo di Quinto Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area km² Dalpe 165 14.5 Prato 433 16.9 Quinto 1085 75.2 Total 1683 106.6 Category:Leventina District
